org.jivesoftware.openfire.event
Interface UserEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
EntityCapabilitiesManager, IQPEPHandler, IQPrivacyHandler, MultiUserChatManager, OfflineMessageStore, PresenceManagerImpl, PrivateStorage, RosterManager, UserEventAdapter
public interface UserEventListener

Interface to listen for group events. Use the UserEventDispatcher.addListener(UserEventListener) method to register for events.

Author:
Matt Tucker

Method Summary
